ingredients.item: 3 essential Waitrose leeks, cut into 2cm pieces
700ml vegetable stock from a Kallo organic very low salt vegetable cube
400g can essential Waitrose cannellini beans, drained

instructions.step: Heat the oil in a large saucepan and fry the leeks and potatoes for 5 minutes. Add the flour and cook for 1 minute.
Stir in the stock, herbs and beans and bring to the boil. Simmer for 15-20 minutes until the vegetables are tender. Serve with the bread.
